welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Kassel, Germany! Get ready to be charmed by our city's rich history, stunning landscapes, and vibrant cultural scene. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Kassel has to offer."

restaurants.name: Il Convento
restaurants.description: Il Convento is a italian restaurant located in Kassel.

restaurants.name: Osteria
restaurants.description: Osteria is a trattoria located in Kassel.

restaurants.name: The Coffee & Bagel People
restaurants.description: The Coffee & Bagel People is a bagel shop located in Kassel.

restaurants.name: Abessina
restaurants.description: Abessina is a african restaurant located in Kassel.

restaurants.name: L'Osteria
restaurants.description: L'Osteria is a trattoria located in Kassel.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kassel-Calden Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for charter and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fritzlar Airbase Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Fritzlar Airbase Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
